word:
"I wish that self should be hid in Jesus. I wish self to be 
     crucified. I do not claim infallibility, or even perfection of 
     Christian character. I am not free from mistakes and errors in my 
     life. Had I followed my Saviour more closely, I should not have to 
     mourn so much my unlikeness to His dear image."--Letter 27, 1876. 


                                    -285-
